key.name: location
key.description: Which screen edge to place the panel on. Possible values are "top", "bottom", "left" or "right".

key.name: size
key.description: Height of panel if horizontal, or the width if it is vertical. Possible values are "small", "medium" or "large".

key.name: hide-policy
key.description: Hide the panel when it isn't being used.

key.name: pinned-launchers
key.description: Launchers that appear permanently on the panel, regardless of whether they are running or not.
